"Must be >" : "Must be <" ) ) %> <% if ( data.order.side === "B" ) { %> <%= data.helpers.formatFlashRate( data.rateAsk + data.stopOrderBuffer, data.prevRateAsk + data.stopOrderBuffer, data.rateChangeAskFlash, true ) %> <% } else { %> <%= data.helpers.formatFlashRate( data.rateBid - data.stopOrderBuffer, data.prevRateBid - data.stopOrderBuffer, data.rateChangeBidFlash, true ) %> <% } %>
